titleStmt.title: The Humble petition of the knights, gentry, clergy, and commonalty of the county of Sussex, presented to both Houses on Wednesday, June 7, 1648 together with the answer of both Houses to the same, June 9, 1648 : to which are added some observations vpon the answer of both Houses to the sayd petition ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
